data.DescriptionHtml:
Cold energy surges through the target's body, congealing the blood in the creature's extremities.
This effect causes a 4 penalty on attacks, Armor Class, and all Strength and Dexterity-related checks, and anyone casting a spell with a somatic component has a 50% chance of spell failure for the duration of the spell.
If the target makes its Fortitude save, the creature only takes a -2 penalty on attacks, Armor Class, and all Strength-and Dexterity-related checks and has only a 25% chance of spell failure for spells with a somatic component.
Material Component: A pinch of flour.
data.Name: Gelid Blood
